narrative_note: 80-year-old Female seen in outpatient clinic for lipid management. History: hypertension; overweight. Assessment: hyperlipidemia. Plan: start Rosuvastatin 10 mg daily on 2025-08-18; counsel on diet/exercise; repeat lipid panel in ~10–12 weeks. Not eligible for cohort due to: Clinical: severe hepatic impairment (ALT/AST > 3×ULN).
